Reference

All functions

acc_changes()

Accumulate changes in a LULC time serie raster

barplotLand()

A barplot for the area of every point in time of the analysed period

Category-class

Class Category

chordDiagramLand()

A circlize plot for the transition between two times point, one step.

contingenceTable()

Contingence Table

demo_landscape()

Create Raster with Random pixel Value

intensityAnalysis()

Perform the intensity analysis from a cross-tabulation matrices

Interval-class

Class Interval

netgrossplot()

A barplot for the Net Gain/Loss and Gross Changes between land use classes for the period analysed

plot(<Interval>,<ANY>) plot(<Category>,<ANY>) plot(<Transition>,<ANY>)

Plot method for objects from Intensity Analysis

sankeyLand()

A sandkey plot for the land use land cover transition for the period analysed

SaoLourencoBasin

Rasters of Land Use and Land Cover of the São Lourenço River Basin (2002 - 2014)

SL_2002_2014

Tables of Land Use and Land Cover of the São Lourenço River Basin (2002 - 2014)

summary_dir()

Summary of multiple parameters in a raster directory

summary_map()

Quick summary of categorical raster raster

Transition-class

Class Transition
